message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving you the upper hand yet!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Accept this and we can end the game.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I deserve a bigger share!
I'm not backing down. I think this is a fair share, considering the value of the money has decreased for you.

I'm not going to let you take advantage of the situation, Bob. This is my final offer.

This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
I'm not leaving with nothing. I'm taking it all!
This is my final, final offer. Take it or leave it. If you reject this, I'm walking away.
Fine, you win. I'll take nothing. Congratulations, Alice.
